title: DONT LET RIOT BAN SINGED SUPPORT.
body: hey guys I think we should have a very peaceful protest of the bullying masses...and we should all stand up and play singed support...they cant ban us for cooperating outside of the game. players agreeing to do with a certain pick is most certainly not a bannable offence.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: If you troll pick in ranked, you will be justifiably reported.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rMYsJKTu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:03:15.120+0000)
>
> If you troll pick in ranked, you will be justifiably reported.

Gotta define a trollpick though. 

That particular support pick was attempting to win through the best means he knew how.  It wasn't intentional feeding, he was simply using his skillset differently than the players around him wanted him to, or understood.

Riot has long stood for the argument that you should be ale to play whoever you want, wherever you want.  If you play that champ to the best of your abilities, it shouldn't be a bannable offense.  Suddenly they've flipped on it, because their new reports system is broken and relies on weight of reports and number of reports instead of having a real human element look at the reports.

It's Garbage and Riot needs to look into their practices.

> Gotta define a trollpick though. 

Playing to lose / suboptimal pick is trolling. In this case, 'support' singed with smite is HARD trolling.

 You can troll all you want in normals, but keep that out of ranked or you will get justifiably reported.

singed has 3 cc how is it sub optimal. people like taric have 1 cc on a long cooldown to a medium cooldown if you dont get poked out  from useing your passive. the only parts of tarics kit that do anything worthwhile is his e and ultimate the other 2 spells are only to get his passive to work to use e more often and have little actuall power. not to mention singed's ult can be used so that he can proform as an effective tank even while building support which is bad for most support tanks. 
I myself have tried to play the pick though it was a few years ago and other off meta support picks but people dont realize the potiential power and give up with out trying to see how the pick works. ive been playing support nautilus from season 4 before it went lcs and i was chastised for troll pick myself.  same with support nasus not like a slow that also slows enemy attack speed isnt good versus adcs  and an aoe magic damage spells that also shreds  enemy armor isnt good in lane with an adc sure its slower less powerful stacking but every champion is less powerful in the support role compared to a solo role. even leona who has no passive when in a solo lane except when enemies gank if she can build more carry like she has more than enough base damage to do well.
Support nasus isnt troll to my teammates because i didnt do damage they expected the same damage from me as a support as a top lane nasus but if i had taken all the farm for stacks id also be trolling

No maokai has 2 disables in 1 spells that could be applied on 5 champions in extremely specific conditions. singed has 3 disables a flip a slow and a root the root from a specific conditions. but 3 none the less your logic is horrible on the off chance you can hit 5 champions in close range with one q the q still only does 2 things thats like saying a 5 man ult with malphite is malphite having 5 knock ups in his kit. its 1 knock up on 5 people.

Playing not to win is the only trolling that should be bannable.  If you pick a suboptimal champ into a ranked game, it's not justified, especially if the player is playing to win.  

Dude won 53% of his games up to plat 3.  That's not trolling, it's not a trollpick, he's just doing it differently than you want him to.  And that argument is myopic.  This line of thought allows players who don't pick a counter pick if their opponents have first picked in lane, or if they pick a countered champ into a known counter matchup to be reported and banned because it's not acceptable meta.  This is a road Riot doesn't, and shouldn't want to go down.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ZIdZercE-singed-guy-is-getting-rightfully-penalized

Wake up.
